content: Thomas Noll | Informatik 2 Home News People Teaching Research Contact Theory of Hybrid Systems LuFG i2 Browsing: » Home »People »Thomas Noll Thomas Noll Emailnoll at cs.rwth-aachen.deAddressRoom 4211 (CS Department, building E1 (2353), 2nd floor)Ahornstraße 55D-52074 AachenPhone+49 241 80 21213 I am an associate professor (apl. Prof.) at the Software Modeling and Verification Group (MOVES), headed by Prof. Joost-Pieter Katoen, in the Faculty of Computer Science at RWTH Aachen University. The office is located at the Computer Science Center. My current research interests include: Static Program Analysis for Software Optimisation and Verification Compilation of Quantum Software Reliability, Safety and Security of Hardware/Software Systems Formal Verification of Artificial Neural Networks Conferences and Workshops Publications Courses and Seminars Supervision of Theses Administration Alumni Latest NewsMISSION at Space Tech Expo 2025November 26, 2025From November 18 to 20, 2025, the MISSION Project was represented at the Space Tech Expo Europe in Bremen, Germany—Europe’s largest B2B space event.
